dct_title_s: Bartholomew's contour motoring map of India showing the main trunk touring roads
dct_alternative_sm: Bartholomew's contour motoring map of India showing the main trunk touring roads
dct_description_sm: Inset: environs of Bombay -- city of Bombay -- environs of Calcutta, etc.; Relief shown as gradient tints and heights in feet.; Shows: railways, roads (2 categories), canals, steamer routes.
